OpenAI has just launched 'Synapse', the world's first AGI-focused operating system, and it's a game-changer.

This isn't just another tech release. Synapse represents a fundamental shift in how we think about AI infrastructure. Designed to support neural networks and real-time decision-making, it's poised to become the backbone of AGI systems globally.
